p: It has been found that various triterpene acids such as chlorogenic acid and maslinic acid have potential in anti-inflammatory activity. Maslinic and pomolic acids show anti-inflammatory and anti-arthritic effects through NF- Ä¸B inactivation. Some researchers found that many significant sources of such compounds show potential in anti-inflammatories and glycemic control effects. Graziani and co-workers also reported that polyphenol extracts of apple prevent damage to human gastric epithelial cells in vitro and rat gastric mucosa in vivo [ 93].
